name: Hyperbound
headline: Sales call roleplay with realistic conversational AI buyers
description:
Hyperbound is a simulated AI sales roleplay platform that turns ICP descriptions into interactive AI buyers in less than 2 minutes. It helps your sales team onboard 50% faster and boosts your team's conversions on cold, warm, & discovery calls.

Every sales team wants to do more roleplays, but it's often unscalable and biased. Instead of having your sellers practice on real prospects and burn leads in the process, Hyperbound allows your reps to get realistic at-bats with an AI buyer. Sellers can finally gain call confidence and mastery in a simulated environment that doesn't put your pipeline at risk and gives time back to your managers.¬†

Interested in trying it out today? Start a free demo simulation at https://app.hyperbound.ai/buyers?invite=bookface and contact us at founders@hyperbound.ai for next steps.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; location:san-francisco-bay-area

#### Don't take our word for it, here's what leaders have to say...
![Cory Bray](https://hyperbound.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fcory-bray.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Cory Bray
Co-Founder & Sales Coach @ CoachCRM
Lawyers practice law. Pro golfers practice golf. Most salespeople wing it, leading to chronic underperformance. Hyperbound has a great solution to this problem to truly professionalize sales.
![Ryan Scalera](https://hyperbound.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fryan-scalera.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Ryan Scalera
Sales Trainer & AE @ Thoropass
Getting to drill call scenarios without throwing reps into live customer situations is a game changer. My team can spend hours perfecting their talk tracks without me being there or the pressure of 'wasting' client opportunities.
![Federico Presicci](https://hyperbound.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Ffederico-presicci.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Federico Presicci
Director of Sales Enablement @ GetAccept
Atul and Sriharsha have developed an extraordinary tool designed to upskill a sales force at scale. With Hyperbound, practice has become more aligned with real-world scenarios than ever before. This advancement helps our reps reach the real-world application stage with significantly enhanced proficiency, bypassing the pitfalls of experiencing objection handling, pitching.
![Drew Coryer](https://hyperbound.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fdrew-coryer.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Drew Coryer
SDR Manager from Webflow
Roleplays helped me become a top seller, but the downside is how unrealistic the conversations can be with peers. The conversation with Hyperbound's AI tool actually felt like a customer call, with objections and questions delivered from the prospect as they would be on a real call. Ramping a new rep to profitability in 4 weeks instead of 12 will allow us to hit our pipeline targets consistently.
![Josh Norris](https://hyperbound.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fjosh-norris.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
Josh Norris
Sales Leader & GTM Consultant
Even with great scripts and sales trainers, you can‚Äôt be confident in your reps' call skills unless they practice. I'm excited for this tech because it lets your reps get the practice they need without burning prospects. They build their skills, your win rates go up, your prospects have a better impression of your business, and you sleep easier at night. Hyperbound will be a household name among sales tech in no time.

Founder @ CliAcquire

**Overview of Hyperbound**

Founded in 2023 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Hyperbound is igniting a revolution in sales training by harnessing the power of AI. Based in San Francisco, this innovative company has a compact team of ten, led by the dynamic duo Atul Raghunathan and Sriharsha Guduguntla. 

**Mission and Product Offering**

Hyperbound‚Äôs mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to empower sales teams through immersive, realistic role-play training with AI buyers. Rather than traditional role-play sessions that are often biased and unscalable, Hyperbound‚Äôs platform allows sales reps to engage in simulated calls with AI personas customized to reflect actual target customer profiles. This unique solution helps sales representatives hone their skills at an accelerated pace, increasing their confidence and effectiveness on calls.

The platform can turn Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) descriptions into interactive AI buyers in under two minutes, significantly cutting down onboarding time by up to 50% and boosting conversion rates during cold, warm, and discovery calls.

**Key Features and Achievements**

Hyperbound is specifically designed to:
- Provide a safe environment for practicing sales calls without risking real leads.
- Help sales teams master crucial skills including objection handling, product pitching, and rapport building.
- Facilitate ongoing training as teams encounter new personas and scenarios.

As of now, Hyperbound boasts impressive statistics, having facilitated over 150,000 calls and 6,000 hours of roleplay for reps across more than 7,000 companies globally.

**Feedback and Industry Impact**

Early adopters and sales professionals are raving about Hyperbound. Thought leaders in the industry laud the platform as a game-changer for sales training, enabling rapid skill acquisition and confidence building. The technology transforms the often awkward and unrealistic practice sessions with peers into genuine sales calls, making training not only efficient but also dare we say, enjoyable.

**Why Try Hyperbound?**

For sales teams looking to elevate their game, Hyperbound offers a free demo simulation that requires no credit card or personal information. This is an excellent opportunity to experience firsthand how AI-driven roleplay can refine sales techniques and enhance performance.

For further inquiries, potential customers can reach out at founders@hyperbound.ai.

**Explore More**

To dive deeper, visit [Hyperbound‚Äôs website](https://hyperbound.ai) today and see how it can help your sales team's training process go from mediocre to extraordinary.
